first_para: Sir Thomas Anthony Cunningham (born 16 September 1952) is a British Labour Party politician who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Workington from 2001 to 2015. Ed Miliband appointed him to replace Mark Lazarowicz as Shadow Minister for International Development. He was removed from the team in the October 2013 reshuffle.

full.extract:
Sir Thomas Anthony Cunningham (born 16 September 1952) is a British Labour Party politician who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Workington from 2001 to 2015. Ed Miliband appointed him to replace Mark Lazarowicz as Shadow Minister for International Development. He was removed from the team in the October 2013 reshuffle.
^ http://www.direct.gov.uk/en/Nl1/Newsroom/DG_202128
^ http://www.labour.org.uk/ed-milibands-new-frontbench-team
^ http://labourlist.org/2013/10/confirmed-labours-new-frontbench-team-in-full/
full.title: Tony Cunningham
